com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.uninstall

Class UninstallPlanBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mesosphere.sdk.scheduler.uninstall.UninstallPlanBuilder

  • class UninstallPlanBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles creation of the uninstall plan, returning information about the plan contents back to the caller.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      UninstallPlanBuilder(java.lang.String serviceName, StateStore stateStore, ConfigStore<ServiceSpec> configStore, SchedulerFlags schedulerFlags, java.util.Optional<SecretsClient> secretsClient) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) Plan getPlan()
      Returns the plan to be used for uninstalling the service.
      (package private) java.util.Collection<Step> getResourceSteps()
      Returns the resource unreservation steps for all tasks in the service.
      (package private) void registered(SchedulerDriver schedulerDriver)
      Passes the provided SchedulerDriver to underlying plan elements.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • UninstallPlanBuilder

        UninstallPlanBuilder(java.lang.String serviceName,

    • Method Detail

      • getPlan

        Plan getPlan()
        Returns the plan to be used for uninstalling the service.

      • getResourceSteps

        java.util.Collection<Step> getResourceSteps()
        Returns the resource unreservation steps for all tasks in the service. Some steps may be already marked as Status.COMPLETE when unreservation has already been performed. An empty list may be returned if no known resources need to be unreserved.

      • registered

        void registered(SchedulerDriver schedulerDriver)
        Passes the provided SchedulerDriver to underlying plan elements.
